Issue.creator: JIRAUSER21004
Issue.summary: In fabric samples off_chain_data example does not work in HLF 2.2
Issue.description: I followed the instructions given in the README.md file. When I ran the command 'node blockEventListener.js' it gave me an error and the off chain couch database did not get populated. I have since found the problem and fixed it. I would like to check-in my fix.
